dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid drawing too much attention to myself. I'll listen carefully to the conversation between Charlie and Bob to gauge their suspicions and adjust my actions accordingly.

dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the assassin. Let's focus on gathering more evidence and try to get the villager on board to vote for Alice.
